title: Google prepares ‘ChromeOS’ rebrand to drop the space [Update: Live in Canary]
content:
Google seems to have decided to fully drop the space and rebrand its desktop operating system to “ChromeOS.”

Update: Google has gone ahead with the rebrand, with the change appearing in pre-release builds of Chrome OS.

more…

The post Google prepares ‘ChromeOS’ rebrand to drop the space [Update: Live in Canary] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google seems to have decided to fully drop the space and rebrand its desktop operating system to "ChromeOS."
